synopsis.text:
Returning from the confines of a city where time is strictly monitored, a young boy named Nona finds solace in the tranquil countryside of Iblard, an enigmatic world conjured by artist Naohisa Inoue. After a chance encounter with a peculiar woman named Ninya, Nona begins a new life on her farm, cultivating the land and embracing the freedom he yearns for.

One fateful day, Nona trades his hard-earned vegetables for an enigmatic star seed. Driven by curiosity and a sense of purpose, he plants the seed, only to witness the miraculous growth of a celestial body. This extraordinary event marks the beginning of an incredible journey, exclusively brought to life at the Ghibli Museum in Mitaka.
